title: Study of Hierarchical Auxetic Materials
description: In collaboration with DRDO (Govt. of India), this paper examines auxetic honeycomb structures with negative Poisson’s ratio. Re-entrant and hexagonal geometries are evaluated using CAD and FEA tools. Additive manufacturing methods for fabrication are explored.
text: In collaboration with DRDO (Govt. of India), this paper examines auxetic honeycomb structures with negative Poisson’s ratio. Re-entrant and hexagonal geometries are evaluated using CAD and FEA tools. Additive manufacturing methods for fabrication are explored.

title: Convolutional Neural Network for Vehicle Detection
description: Real-time object detection for self-driving car perception using YOLOv2, trained on a custom dataset with TensorFlow for identifying vehicles in dashcam footage.
text: Implemented a deep learning-based object detection system using YOLOv2 to localize and classify vehicles in real-time for autonomous driving applications.

title: Fire Fighting Robot
description: This paper introduces QRob, a compact firefighting robot for hazardous and confined spaces. It uses sensors and a water pump to detect and extinguish fires remotely. Real-time video feed and remote control enhance firefighter safety and situational awareness.
text: This paper introduces QRob, a compact firefighting robot for hazardous and confined spaces. It uses sensors and a water pump to detect and extinguish fires remotely. Real-time video feed and remote control enhance firefighter safety and situational awareness.
